ts":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_dai","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_tokenId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdrawDeposit","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"Andrew Stanger","details":"ensure usingAugur is set to false upon local testing and true on kovan or mainnet","methods":{"_collectRent(uint256)":{"details":"also updates calculates and updates how long the current user has held the token for"},"collectRentAllTokens()":{"details":"originally a modifier but changed to a function to make it easy for me to call whenever I want to keep people paying their rent"},"exit(uint256)":{"details":"do not need to be the current owner"},"getOwnerTrackerAddress(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"used in testing only"},"getOwnerTrackerPrice(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"used in testing only"},"getTestDai()":{"details":"only a relevant function on kovan, that is why safeMath is not requiredinstead of the user getting testDai to his account, it is generated here and and allocated to the user"},"getTestDaiBalance()":{"details":"for front end and testing only","return":"test dai balance"},"liveDepositAbleToWithdraw(uint256)":{"details":"for front end only","return":"how much the current owner has deposited"},"rentOwed(uint256)":{"details":"called in collectRent function, and various other view functions "},"rentalExpiryTime(uint256)":{"details":"for front end only","return":"estimated rental expiry time"},"step1checkMarketsResolved(uint256,bool)":{"details":"these six functions are done seperately because if they were done at once, the gas cost could easily cross the block limitcan be called by anyone can be called multiple times, but only once after markets have indeed resolvedthe two arguments passed are for testing only"},"step2getLoopsRequired()":{"details":"this function gets the required number of loops needed in the returnDeposits and returnAllFunds functions. We get it once only to save gas. can be called by anyone, but only once"},"step3returnDeposits(uint256)":{"details":"the _numberOfLoopsToDo argument allows this function to be completed over multiple txs, protecting against denial of service attackstrying to return all deposits to all users at once could easily hit the block limitcan be called by anyone, but only once (all the way through)"},"step4sellCompleteSets()":{"details":"gets funds back from Augurcan be called by anyone, but only once "},"step5getDaiAvailableToDistribute()":{"details":"the figure cannot be hard coded in advance because of Augur fees can be called by anyone, but only once"},"step6complete(uint256)":{"details":"can be called by anyone, but only once (all the way through)_numberOfLoopsToDo and _hardCodedWinner are testing variables only"},"userDepositAbleToWithdraw(uint256)":{"details":"for front end only","return":"how much the current user (regardless of whether or not they own it) has deposited"},"withdrawDeposit(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"do not need to be the current owner"}},"title":"Harber"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"_collectRent(uint256)":{"notice":"collects rent for a specific token"},"changePrice(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"increase the price of an existing rental"},"collectRentAllTokens()":{"notice":"/////////// ORDINARY COURSE OF BUSINESS FUNCTIONS //////////////collects rent for all tokens"},"constructor":"/////////// CONSTRUCTOR //////////////","depositDai(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"add new dai deposit to an existing rental"},"exit(uint256)":{"notice":"withdraw full deposit"},"getOwnerTrackerPrice(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"/////////// VIEW FUNCTIONS //////////////"},"getTestDai()":{"notice":"/////////// AUGUR FUNCTIONS //////////////get test Dai to allow a user to rent tokens"},"newRental(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"to rent a token"},"step1BemergencyExit()":{"notice":"emergency function in case the augur markets never resolve for whatever reasonreturns all funds to all userscan only be called 6 months after augur markets should have ended "},"step1CcircuitBraker()":{"notice":"Same as above, except that only I can call it, and I can call it whenever"},"step1checkMarketsResolved(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"/////////// MARKET RESOLUTION FUNCTIONS ////////////// the first of six functions which must be called, one after the other, to conclude the competitionthis function checks whether the Augur markets have resolved, and if yes, whether they resolved correct or not"},"step2getLoopsRequired()":{"notice":"the second of six functions which must be called, one after the other, to conclude the competition"},"step3returnDeposits(uint256)":{"notice":"the third of six functions which must be called, one after the other, to conclude the competitionreturns unused deposits to all users"},"step4sellCompleteSets()":{"notice":"the fourth of six functions which must be called, one after the other, to conclude the competition"},"step5getDaiAvailableToDistribute()":{"notice":"the fifth of six functions which must be called, one after the other, to conclude the competitiongets the available funds for distribution and pays me my 1%"},"step6complete(uint256)":{"notice":"the final of six functions which must be called, one after the other, to conclude the competitiondetermines whether markets resolved correctly- if yes, payout winnings, if not, return all funds"},"withdrawDeposit(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"withdraw deposit"}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/mcplums/Repos/Harber/contracts/Harber.sol":"Harber"},"evmVersion":"petersburg","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/mcplums/Repos/Harber/contracts/Harber.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2b4aaac3b31f3653c58d98ed1c02f70f416ed71ce6453a94c1b5f24f09066ea7","urls":["bzz-raw://6807ad43aa6a44e0ab778eb495b170f811c331182b9185191ae273bc660c699a","dweb:/ipfs/QmRZTvhkqhGzfQQyZ8BTbr6MRTpmhnVQJM1cHjkiYcyy21"]},"/Users/mcplums/Repos/Harber/contracts/interfaces/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0xfb2758dbd44b9aab19f4e145f076c37b5d4f47d4af450061c06fcb51f2ddf310","urls":["bzz-raw://52f83ece2985e7c333117eff36ae7cef18a00998f0ed1ea0134830da954fdfb2","dweb:/ipfs/QmXLWvXwWWME5hFxH6utqch8Yeh8fRA3qoAPmidHPk9vir"]},"/Users/mcplums/Repos/Harber/contracts/interfaces/IERC721.sol":{"keccak256":"0x714ab930f651f1744e8b75df725f6b8cfaa402be86e18be0efbdf0a0dcb690eb","urls":["bzz-raw://87138f1ac46c82a95563f753e80590ebfaeba7fbd880c1cd1e70a6342e0d2756","dweb:/ipfs/QmWTgqjfZ1ri1BaFwKS5WyFzjTpUGCQTWsL53f7KfEcQ15"]},"/Users/mcplums/Repos/Harber/contracts/interfaces/IERC721Enumerable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdde577e95abc5370efa42ee66071c33ac64aea839db76a239479f0c3af653901","urls":["bzz-raw://cde1843a93dfa48580b5a8464e187913fe2cfdec25e6fe380626843350937f58","dweb:/ipfs/Qmarj8yfwjg1hU5nueqyc6zHP5GLxUwM2khmXzApmHDzB8"]},"/Users/mcplums/Repos/Harber/contracts/interfaces/IERC721Full.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa00f72be5a19c0ebadc7ae50bc4a02010e7b787280598b0e6c489ef40e373200","urls":["bzz-raw://14f97a4a3be993bd60f5bc43c515469fcfa1c3040e6e852e0e591b72b51e4577","dweb:/ipfs/QmbanBddbhrKRWr5KVNSphNnntujor1VqviQLESUkLemcL"]},"/Users/mcplums/Repos/Harber/contracts/interfaces/IERC721Metadata.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe19ae36b15fee6afa6bde028b3b525eeeac0db8cc569b4588f208e0589854ba3","urls":["bzz-raw://5d610184327d47a2b8b4af9472962c6a5d76688d208aa6f72694896821555de9","dweb:/ipfs/QmWp5dgPJhvZaDBMtZq5weTdNnKzWwBmYh4vypJPmV1B1d"]},"/Users/mcplums/Repos devdoc.author: Andrew Stanger
devdoc.details: ensure usingAugur is set to false upon local testing and true on kovan or mainnet

_collectRent(uint256).details: also updates calculates and updates how long the current user has held the token for

collectRentAllTokens().details: originally a modifier but changed to a function to make it easy for me to call whenever I want to keep people paying their rent

exit(uint256).details: do not need to be the current owner

getTestDai().details: only a relevant function on kovan, that is why safeMath is not requiredinstead of the user getting testDai to his account, it is generated here and and allocated to the user

getTestDaiBalance().details: for front end and testing only

liveDepositAbleToWithdraw(uint256).return: how much the current owner has deposited

rentOwed(uint256).details: called in collectRent function, and various other view functions

step1checkMarketsResolved(uint256,bool).details: these six functions are done seperately because if they were done at once, the gas cost could easily cross the block limitcan be called by anyone can be called multiple times, but only once after markets have indeed resolvedthe two arguments passed are for testing only

step2getLoopsRequired().details: this function gets the required number of loops needed in the returnDeposits and returnAllFunds functions. We get it once only to save gas. can be called by anyone, but only once

step3returnDeposits(uint256).details: the _numberOfLoopsToDo argument allows this function to be completed over multiple txs, protecting against denial of service attackstrying to return all deposits to all users at once could easily hit the block limitcan be called by anyone, but only once (all the way through)

step4sellCompleteSets().details: gets funds back from Augurcan be called by anyone, but only once

step5getDaiAvailableToDistribute().details: the figure cannot be hard coded in advance because of Augur fees can be called by anyone, but only once

step6complete(uint256).details: can be called by anyone, but only once (all the way through)_numberOfLoopsToDo and _hardCodedWinner are testing variables only

userDepositAbleToWithdraw(uint256).return: how much the current user (regardless of whether or not they own it) has deposited

withdrawDeposit(uint256,uint256).details: do not need to be the current owner

devdoc.title: Harber

_collectRent(uint256).notice: collects rent for a specific token

changePrice(uint256,uint256).notice: increase the price of an existing rental

collectRentAllTokens().notice: /////////// ORDINARY COURSE OF BUSINESS FUNCTIONS //////////////collects rent for all tokens

depositDai(uint256,uint256).notice: add new dai deposit to an existing rental

getTestDai().notice: /////////// AUGUR FUNCTIONS //////////////get test Dai to allow a user to rent tokens

step1BemergencyExit().notice: emergency function in case the augur markets never resolve for whatever reasonreturns all funds to all userscan only be called 6 months after augur markets should have ended

step1CcircuitBraker().notice: Same as above, except that only I can call it, and I can call it whenever

step1checkMarketsResolved(uint256,bool).notice: /////////// MARKET RESOLUTION FUNCTIONS ////////////// the first of six functions which must be called, one after the other, to conclude the competitionthis function checks whether the Augur markets have resolved, and if yes, whether they resolved correct or not

step2getLoopsRequired().notice: the second of six functions which must be called, one after the other, to conclude the competition

step3returnDeposits(uint256).notice: the third of six functions which must be called, one after the other, to conclude the competitionreturns unused deposits to all users

step4sellCompleteSets().notice: the fourth of six functions which must be called, one after the other, to conclude the competition

step5getDaiAvailableToDistribute().notice: the fifth of six functions which must be called, one after the other, to conclude the competitiongets the available funds for distribution and pays me my 1%

step6complete(uint256).notice: the final of six functions which must be called, one after the other, to conclude the competitiondetermines whether markets resolved correctly- if yes, payout winnings, if not, return all funds
